p4: Keep your title tag under 60 characters to avoid truncation in search results, while descriptions should aim for 150-160 characters. Include your primary keyword near the beginning of both fields for better SEO performance. For Open Graph images, use dimensions of at least 1200x630 pixels to ensure sharp previews across all platforms. Test your generated tags using Facebook's Sharing Debugger and Twitter's Card Validator before publishing to catch any issues early.
